com.azwave.androidzwave.distant

Class Information

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.azwave.androidzwave.distant.Information
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Information
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Object representing an information of a Node with a name, a value and an unit. It's serializable to allow to send it with sockets.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
